title: Roald Dahl, A Bottle Of Dreams And A 'Letter Of Note'
teaser: Audie Cornish speaks with Amy Corcoran, who shares a treasure from her childhood: a letter she received when she was 7 years old, from her favorite author at the time, Roald Dahl.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
